response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value to you, we estimate it to be worth $1,000,000. We are offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $900,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a substantial saving and to ensure that you benefit from the high-quality features and performance of our product.

Please consider this proposal carefully. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me directly. We are confident that our product will meet and exceed your expectations, and we look forward to the possibility of working together.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 900000}
